Workshop on two practical aspects of managing audio/video data:
1) efficient transcription with Whisper AI on the University of Bern’s UBELIX supercomputer
2) long-term data archiving strategies with SWISSUbase (FAIR-aligned)
Time: Wednesday, 29 November 2023, 16:15–17:45
Place: Unitobler, F-107 (Bern)
